mapper.sql: REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_SUBJECT, REVIEW_CONTENT, PICTURE_NAME, THUMBNAIL_NAME, STAR, REVIEW_DATE, MEMBER_ID, OUTER_NO
SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_SUBJECT, REVIEW_CONTENT, PICTURE_NAME, THUMBNAIL_NAME, STAR, REVIEW_DATE, MEMBER_ID, OUTER_NO FROM REVIEW

SELECT r.REVIEW_NO, r.REVIEW_SUBJECT, r.REVIEW_CONTENT, r.PICTURE_NAME, r.THUMBNAIL_NAME, r.STAR, r.REVIEW_DATE, r.MEMBER_ID, o.OUTER_NO, o.OUTER_TYPE, o.OUTER_NAME, o.OUTER_CONTENT, o.OUTER_PRICE, o.OUTER_DATE, o.OUTER_THUMBNAIL_NAME, o.OUTER_IMAGENAME FROM REVIEW r, OUTER_TB o WHERE r.OUTER_NO = o.OUTER_NO(+)
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_SUBJECT = #{subject}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{content}, PICTURE_NAME = #{pictureName}, THUMBNAIL_NAME = #{thumbnailName}, STAR = #{star}, REVIEW_DATE = #{reviewDate}, MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}, OUTER_NO = #{outerNo} WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
